Name: Lantern Light VR
About the game: Lantern Light Lantern Light is a relaxing archery dungeon game. Discover enchanting worlds inside the dungeon. The dungeon is Large and you'll need to explore in order to find a way out. Master difficult puzzles. Each room gets more difficult and presents new challenges. On the surface There's a story that you the player are trapped within a dungeon. someone informs you there's a magic key in the dungeon and if you get it to them they can let you out. If you look throughout the dungeons there may be evidence of previous adventurers, and their fate might be very close to yours. Gameplay Comfortable Room-Scale experience and designed controls with comfort in mind. Controls Shoot Arrows - When both controllers are close an arrow will automatically nock. Pinch the right trigger, pull back and release. Interact - Use your free hand (Right Hand) to interact with objects in the scene. Menu - Hold right trigger + right grip = open menu. - After the menu is open swipe up to reset the lanterns and Arrows. - After the menu is open swipe down to return to main menu.
